description.value:
Ijtikri traits vary based on where the individual developed, granting a +2 racial bonus to a skill, as well as a spell-like ability usable once per day. Caster level equals the ijtikri’s level or CR. The skill and spell-like ability are as follows:

Emerald: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.tVUA3IPcOfyU1g19]{Life Science}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.PVzsrE1TxBBjDLCa]{Command} NS 

Ijtikris take up a signature from the environment they developed in, causing differing structural manifestations and coloration. Those not raised on Vesk-2 can be bathed in admixtures that mimic their home world’s environment. Otherwise they might develop unique traits based on the local environment.

After adding the spell to the Spellbook tab, edit the spell's Details, changing the Spell Preparation Mode to Innate Spellcasting, and change Limited uses to 1 of 1 Day.

modifiers.name: Mineral Signature, Emerald
